sentences.english: Presently she started up, exclaiming that they wouldbe late for breakfast;
sentences.chinese: 不一會兒她跳了起來，嚷着他們要耽誤早飯了。

sentences.english: Please make your beds after breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 早飯後請把你們的牀鋪整理好。

sentences.english: Let's have a cold tub before breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我們在早飯前洗個冷水澡吧。

sentences.english: Roy:Apparently, getting your ass kicked is now a part of this complete breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 看起來，被打得稀里嘩啦會是你整頓早飯的一部分了。

sentences.english: In the morning the Anglo-Indian widow sent for me to breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上這位英裔印度官員的寡婦請我去喫早飯。

sentences.english: Every morning I get up at seven I do some exercise and have a light breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早上七點鐘起牀，鍛鍊一下身體，然後喫早飯。

sentences.english: The little round table and chairs is a great place to work or have breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 小圓桌和椅子用來喫早飯或者工作都可以。

sentences.english: We have breakfast at five to seven.
sentences.chinese: 我們七點差五分喫早飯。

sentences.english: Have you had your breakfast already?
He wolfed down his breakfast and left.
sentences.chinese: 他狼吞虎嚥地喫下早飯就走了。

sentences.english: I read the newspaper over breakfast.
After breakfast, i went to the vegetable field with grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 早飯後，我和奶奶一起去了菜地裏。

sentences.english: As a result of skipping breakfast, some students find it hard to concentrate in class.
sentences.chinese: 不喫早飯的結果是，有的學生上課時精神難以集中。

sentences.english: We got off immediately after breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 早飯後我們立即動身了。

sentences.english: You need to eat your breakfast.
Dr. Perricone recommends taking one packet daily in the AM.
sentences.chinese: 裴麗康醫生建議每天早飯後口服一包。

definition: to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
to starve to death/to be very hungry
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to finish class/to get out of class
